sys_ux_client_script.name: Update browser title

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_ef37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4380
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="List">1b3707b8472231107b748a5f746d43f8</macroponent><name>Update browser title</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const { title } = event.payload;
    if (title) {
        api.emit("CONTENT_UPDATED", {
            title: event.payload.title
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>ef37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4380</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update browser title</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ef37cfb8472231107b748a5f746d4380</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-14 13:19:27</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
